sentences.en: Bloom scored two touchdowns Saturday in a scrimmage.
sentences.cn: 布卢姆在周六的一场混战中两次达阵得分。

sentences.en: The Bears stacked the line of scrimmage with extra defenders to stop the run.
sentences.cn: 熊队在争球线积聚了额外的防守队员来阻挡进跑。

sentences.en: One of the players on the line of scrimmage .
sentences.cn: 在争球线上控球的队员的位置。
